section.title: Flexible Files Layout Type LAYOUTSTATS
section.t: If the client is using NFSv4.2 to communicate with the metadata server, then instead of waiting for a LAYOUTRETURN to send I/O statistics to the metadata server (see ), it MAY use LAYOUTSTATS (see Section 15.7 of ) to communicate that information. For the Flexible Files Layout Type, this means that LAYOUTSTATS4args.lsa_layoutupdate is overloaded with the same contents as in ffis_layoutupdate.
